title: 송준화 교수님 연구실 Best Demo Award 수상
content:
[축하합니다]
송준화 교수님 연구실에서 6월말 ACM MobiSys, IEEE SECON 2개 학회에 발표한 논문 2건이 각각 Best Demo Award 를 수상하였습니다.
또한 IEEE SECON 학회에서는 추가 1건의 Best Demo Honorable Mention (best demo 추천) 이 있었습니다.
ACM MobiSys 2012 (
http://www.sigmobile.org/mobisys/2012/index.php
)
Best Demo Award
Title: ExerLink: Enabling Pervasive Social Exergames with Heterogeneous Exercise Devices
Authors: Taiwoo Park, Inseok Hwang, Uichin Lee, Sunghoon Ivan Lee, Chungkuk Yoo, Youngki Lee, Hyukjae Jang, Sungwon Peter Choe, Souneil Park, Junehwa Song
IEEE SECON 2012 (
http://www.ieee-secon.org/
)
Best Demo Award
Title: E-Gesture: A Collaborative Architecture for Energy-efficient Gesture Recognition with Hand-worn Sensor and Mobile Devices
Authors: Taiwoo Park, Jinwon Lee, Inseok Hwang, Chungkuk Yoo, Lama Nachman, Junehwa Song
Best Demo Honorable Mention
Title: ExerLink: Enabling Pervasive Social Exergames with Heterogeneous Exercise Devices
Authors: Taiwoo Park, Inseok Hwang, Uichin Lee, Sunghoon Ivan Lee, Chungkuk Yoo, Youngki Lee, Hyukjae Jang, Sungwon Peter Choe, Souneil Park, Junehwa Song
